text: Crash Twinsanity is a video game. It was published by Vivendi Universal Games. It was developed by Traveller's Tales for the PlayStation 2 and the Xbox. It was released in North America on October 1, 2004, in Europe on October 8, 2004 and in Japan on December 9, 2004. A Nintendo GameCube version was planned but it was later canceled. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:2004 video games Category:Crash Bandicoot (video game series) Category:3D platformers Category:Open-world video games Category:PlayStation 2 games Category:Single-player video games Category:Xbox games
title: Crash Twinsanity
